targets.query: select last(uptime) from system where  host =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last("load1") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last("load15") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT mean("n_cpus") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last(used_percent) FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT max(used_percent) FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ and path != '/boot' and "device" != 'rootfs' and $timeFilter
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "swap" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total") FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_system") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load15") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load5") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load1") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("cached") FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "autogen"."temp" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") AS "total" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "path" fill(null)
SELECT mean("used") AS "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "path" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("read_bytes"), 10s)  as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) , "name"  fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes"), 10s)  as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) , "name"  fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 10s) AS "IN" FROM "net" WHERE $timeFilter  and "host" =~ /^$host$/   GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 10s) AS "OUT" FROM "net" WHERE $timeFilter  and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)
SELECT mean(tcp_established)   FROM "netstat" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(tcp_syn_recv)   FROM "netstat" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(tcp_time_wait)   FROM "netstat" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(udp_socket)   FROM "netstat" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select blocked,running,sleeping,total,total_threads,zombies from processes where  host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter

list.label: host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host"
